framework.name: Collective Outcome 1: Durable Solutions for IDPs

children.name: By 2025, 80 per cent of IDPs and returnees will have achieved a durable solution in harmony and with full respect of the rights of communities hosting or receiving them.

Authorities at both the national and local levels have strengthened capacities to exert leadership and facilitate coordination to support durable solutions for IDPs and returnees.
